message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal for both of us!
How about a 55/45 split? It's closer to even and still a good deal for us both considering the inflation.
Considering the inflation, I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve a bit more. How about 57-43?
Time is running out and inflation is eating away at your share. I'm offering a 51/49 split. Take it before it's too late!
I'm still not convinced by your offers. Inflation or not, I think 55-45 is the fairest split. Take it or leave it!
